arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds has a Boxing Day to remember after Wrexham's magical moment at the Racecourse Ground
arts.sum: I n a thrilling Boxing Day clash at the Racecourse Ground, Paul Mullin of Wrexham delivered a moment of sheer brilliance that left fans in awe, just like it left part owner Ryan Reynolds . The match against Blackpool had started on a challenging note for Wrexham, as Ashley Fletcher found the back of the net for the visitors just three minutes into the game.

arts.ttl: Fletcher gives Wrexham win after Mullin stunner
Wrexham come from behind to rock Blackpool
arts.sum: Steven Fletcher scored a late penalty to secure the points.

arts.ttl: Wrexham 'plot move for Championship striker' after current manager's telling remark
arts.sum: Wrexham are reported to be eyeing a bid for Bristol City's Harry Cornick in January

arts.ttl: Preview: Wrexham vs. Blackpool - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's League One clash between Wrexham and Blackpool, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
